mapper.select: SELECT sed.send_d_id, sem.send_code, sed.box_code, sed.package_barcode,sed.pickup_code, sed.waybill_code, sem.send_type,sem.create_site_code, sem.receive_site_code, sem.operate_time,sem.update_time, sem.create_user, sed.is_cancel,sem.create_user_code,sem.yn From send_d sed Inner Join send_m sem On sed.box_code = sem.box_code and sed.receive_site_code= sem.receive_site_code and sed.create_site_code= sem.create_site_code where sed.sendd_status=0 and sem.create_Time <= timestampadd(minute, -10, now()) and sed.create_Time >= timestampadd(DAY, -2, now()) and mod(sed.send_d_id,8) in <foreach collection="queueIds" item="item" index="index" open="(" close=")" separator=","> #{item, jdbcType=BIGINT} </foreach> LIMIT 500

select distinct waybill_code from send_d where box_code=#{boxCode} and yn=1
and create_site_code = #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select send_d_id, send_code, box_code, package_barcode, waybill_code,pickup_code, send_type,create_site_code, receive_site_code, create_time, create_user, create_user_code, sendd_status,is_cancel, weight, update_time, yn from send_d where send_code in
#{items,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1 and send_type = 10
and create_site_code in
#{items,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select send_d_id, send_code, box_code, package_barcode, waybill_code,pickup_code, send_type,create_site_code, receive_site_code, create_time, create_user, create_user_code, sendd_status,is_cancel, weight, update_time, yn from send_d where send_code in
#{items,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and yn = 1 and send_type = 30
and create_site_code in
#{items,jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT send_d_id, send_code, box_code, package_barcode, package_num, waybill_code, pickup_code, create_site_code, receive_site_code, send_type, create_time, operate_time, create_user, create_user_code, sendd_status, weight, is_cancel, update_time, excute_count, excute_time, yn, spare_reason, is_loss, feature_type FROM send_d WHERE yn = 1 AND send_code = #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND create_site_code = #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER} AND receive_site_code = #{receiveSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
AND sendd_status = #{senddStatus, jdbcType=INTEGER}

SELECT send_code, waybill_code, package_barcode, create_site_code,receive_site_code, create_time, create_user, create_user_code FROM send_d WHERE yn = 1 AND send_code = #{sendCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND create_site_code = #{createSiteCode,jdbcType=INTEGER}
